verses.verse: Then the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> to me <S%H559>saying,<s%>

"And you, <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> will you <S%H8199>judge,<s%> will you <S%H8199>judge<s%> the <S%H1818>bloody<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%>? Then cause her to <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> her <S%H8441>abominations.<s%>

"And you shall <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H3541>'Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%>" A <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H8210>shedding<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%> in her <S%H8432>midst,<s%> so that her <S%H6256>time<s%> will <S%H935>come,<s%> and that <S%H6213>makes<s%> <S%H1544>idols,<s%> <S%H5921>contrary<s%> to her [interest,] for <S%H2930>defilement!<s%>

"You have <S%H816>become<s%> <S%H816>guilty<s%> by the <S%H1818>blood<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you have <S%H8210>shed,<s%> and <S%H2930>defiled<s%> by your <S%H1544>idols<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you have <S%H6213>made.<s%> Thus you have <S%H7126>brought<s%> your <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H7126>near<s%> and have <S%H935>come<s%> to your <S%H8141>years;<s%> <S%H5921>therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> I have <S%H5414>made<s%> you a <S%H2781>reproach<s%> to the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> and a <S%H7048>mocking<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>lands.<s%>

"Those <S%H7138>who<s%> are <S%H7138>near<s%> and those <S%H7350>who<s%> are <S%H7350>far<s%> from you will <S%H7046>mock<s%> you, you of <S%H2931>ill<s%> <S%H8034>repute,<s%> <S%H7227>full<s%> of <S%H4103>turmoil.<s%>

<S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> the <S%H5387>rulers<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H376>each<s%> according to his <S%H2220>power,<s%> have <S%H1961>been<s%> in you for the <S%H4616>purpose<s%> of <S%H8210>shedding<s%> <S%H1818>blood.<s%>

"They have <S%H7043>treated<s%> father and <S%H1>mother<s%> <S%H517>lightly<s%> within you. The <S%H7043>alien<s%> they have <S%H1616>oppressed<s%> <S%H6213><s%> in your <S%H6233>midst;<s%> the <S%H8432>fatherless<s%> and the <S%H3490>widow<s%> they have <S%H490>wronged<s%> in you.
"You have <S%H959>despised<s%> My <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H6944>things<s%> and <S%H2490>profaned<s%> My <S%H7676>sabbaths.<s%>

<S%H7400>"Slanderous<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> have <S%H1961>been<s%> in you for the <S%H4616>purpose<s%> of <S%H8210>shedding<s%> <S%H1818>blood,<s%> and in you they have <S%H398>eaten<s%> at the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> [shrines.] In your <S%H8432>midst<s%> they have <S%H6213>committed<s%> <S%H2154>acts<s%> of <S%H2154>lewdness.<s%>

"In you they have <S%H1540>uncovered<s%> [their] fathers' <S%H6172>nakedness;<s%> in you they have <S%H6031>humbled<s%> her <S%H2931>who<s%> was <S%H2931>unclean<s%> in her <S%H5079>menstrual<s%> <S%H5079>impurity.<s%>

"And <S%H376>one<s%> has <S%H6213>committed<s%> <S%H8441>abomination<s%> with his neighbor's <S%H802>wife,<s%> and <S%H376>another<s%> has <S%H2154>lewdly<s%> <S%H2930>defiled<s%> his <S%H1323>daughter-in-law<s%>. And <S%H376>another<s%> in you has <S%H6031>humbled<s%> his <S%H269>sister,<s%> his father's daughter.

"In you they have <S%H3947>taken<s%> <S%H7810>bribes<s%> to <S%H8210>shed<s%> <S%H1818>blood;<s%> you have <S%H3947>taken<s%> <S%H5392>interest<s%> and <S%H8636>profits,<s%> and you have <S%H1214>injured<s%> your <S%H7453>neighbors<s%> for <S%H1214>gain<s%> by <S%H6233>oppression,<s%> and you have <S%H7911>forgotten<s%> Me," <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God.<s%>

<S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> then, I <S%H5221>smite<s%> My <S%H3709>hand<s%> at your <S%H1215>dishonest<s%> <S%H1215>gain<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you have <S%H6213>acquired<s%> and at the <S%H1818>bloodshed<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is <S%H8432>among<s%> you.

"Can your <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H5975>endure,<s%> <S%H518>or<s%> can your <S%H3027>hands<s%> be <S%H2388>strong,<s%> in the <S%H3117>days<s%> that I shall <S%H6213>deal<s%> with you? I, the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> and shall <S%H6213>act.<s%>

"And I shall <S%H6327>scatter<s%> you among the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> and I shall <S%H2219>disperse<s%> you through the <S%H776>lands,<s%> and I shall <S%H8552>consume<s%> your <S%H2932>uncleanness<s%> from you.
"And you will <S%H2490>profane<s%> yourself in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> and you will <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>"' "
And the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> to me <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1121>"Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> has <S%H1961>become<s%> <S%H5509>dross<s%> to Me; <S%H3605>all<s%> of them are <S%H5178>bronze<s%> and <S%H913>tin<s%> and <S%H1270>iron<s%> and <S%H5777>lead<s%> in the <S%H3564>furnace;<s%> they are the <S%H5509>dross<s%> of <S%H3701>silver.<s%>

<S%H3651>"Therefore,<s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> <S%H3282>'Because<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> of you have <S%H1961>become<s%> <S%H5509>dross,<s%> <S%H3651>therefore,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> I am going to <S%H6908>gather<s%> you into the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

'As they <S%H6910>gather<s%> <S%H3701>silver<s%> and <S%H5178>bronze<s%> and <S%H1270>iron<s%> and <S%H5777>lead<s%> and <S%H913>tin<s%> into the <S%H3564>furnace<s%> to <S%H5301>blow<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%> on it in order to <S%H5413>melt<s%> [it,] <S%H3651>so<s%> I shall <S%H6908>gather<s%> [you] in My <S%H639>anger<s%> and in My <S%H2534>wrath,<s%> and I shall <S%H5117>lay<s%> you [there] and <S%H5413>melt<s%> you.
'And I shall <S%H3664>gather<s%> you and <S%H5301>blow<s%> on you with the <S%H784>fire<s%> of My <S%H5678>wrath,<s%> and you will be <S%H5413>melted<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of it.

'As <S%H3701>silver<s%> is <S%H2046>melted<s%> in the <S%H3564>furnace,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> you will be <S%H5413>melted<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of it; and you will <S%H3045>know<s%> that I, the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> have <S%H8210>poured<s%> out My <S%H2534>wrath<s%> on you.' "
And the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> to me <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1121>"Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H559>say<s%> to her, 'You are a <S%H776>land<s%> that is not <S%H2891>cleansed<s%> or <S%H1652>rained<s%> on in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H2195>indignation.<s%>'

"There is a <S%H7195>conspiracy<s%> of her <S%H5030>prophets<s%> in her <S%H8432>midst,<s%> like a <S%H7580>roaring<s%> <S%H738>lion<s%> <S%H2963>tearing<s%> the <S%H2964>prey.<s%> They have <S%H398>devoured<s%> <S%H5315>lives;<s%> they have <S%H3947>taken<s%> <S%H2633>treasure<s%> and <S%H3366>precious<s%> <S%H3366>things;<s%> they have <S%H7235>made<s%> <S%H7235>many<s%> <S%H490>widows<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of her.

"Her <S%H3548>priests<s%> have <S%H2554>done<s%> <S%H2554>violence<s%> to My <S%H8451>law<s%> and have <S%H2490>profaned<s%> My <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H6944>things;<s%> they have <S%H914>made<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H914>distinction<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> the <S%H6944>holy<s%> and the <S%H2455>profane,<s%> and they have not <S%H3045>taught<s%> the difference <S%H996>between<s%> the <S%H2931>unclean<s%> and the <S%H2889>clean;<s%> and they <S%H5956>hide<s%> their <S%H5869>eyes<s%> from My <S%H7676>sabbaths,<s%> and I am <S%H2490>profaned<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> them.

"Her <S%H8269>princes<s%> <S%H7130>within<s%> her are like <S%H2061>wolves<s%> <S%H2963>tearing<s%> the <S%H2964>prey,<s%> by <S%H8210>shedding<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%> [and] destroying <S%H6>lives<s%> in <S%H5315>order<s%> to <S%H4616>get<s%> <S%H1214>dishonest<s%> <S%H1214>gain.<s%>

"And her <S%H5030>prophets<s%> have <S%H2902>smeared<s%> <S%H9648>whitewash<s%> for them, <S%H2372>seeing<s%> <S%H7723>false<s%> <S%H7723>visions<s%> and <S%H7080>divining<s%> <S%H3577>lies<s%> for them, <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3541>'Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%>' when the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has not <S%H1696>spoken.<s%>

"The <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> have <S%H6231>practiced<s%> <S%H6233>oppression<s%> and <S%H1497>committed<s%> <S%H1498>robbery,<s%> and they have <S%H3238>wronged<s%> the <S%H6041>poor<s%> and <S%H34>needy<s%> and have <S%H6231>oppressed<s%> the <S%H1616>sojourner<s%> <S%H3808>without<s%> <S%H4941>justice.<s%>

"And I <S%H1245>searched<s%> for a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H4480>among<s%> them who should <S%H1443>build<s%> up the <S%H1447>wall<s%> and <S%H5975>stand<s%> in the <S%H6556>gap<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> Me for the <S%H776>land,<s%> that I should not <S%H7843>destroy<s%> it; but I <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> one.

"Thus I have <S%H8210>poured<s%> out My <S%H2195>indignation<s%> on them; I have <S%H3615>consumed<s%> them with the <S%H784>fire<s%> of My <S%H5678>wrath;<s%> their <S%H1870>way<s%> I have <S%H5414>brought<s%> upon their <S%H7218>heads,<s%>" <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God.<s%>
